examples: Meryl Streep is a highly acclaimed actress.
She dreams of becoming an actress someday.
The actress won an award for her performance in the play.
Meryl Streep é uma atriz muito aclamada.
Ela sonha em se tornar atriz algum dia.
A atriz ganhou um prêmio por sua performance na peça.

suggested: Why did the actress go to jail? Because she stole the spotlight.
It's tough being an actress in Hollywood, with all the pressure to look a certain way and be perfect.
I'm angry at the industry for perpetuating unrealistic beauty standards for actresses.
Did you know that the first female film director was also an actress? Her name was Alice Guy-Blaché.
The smell of makeup and hairspray backstage at a play or film set.
The feeling of adrenaline rush when an actress steps on stage to perform in front of a live audience.
Actresses have the power to connect with audiences through their performances and bring people together.
